snippet: Nick Imirziades, who has owned 15 restaurants in New York since 1963, is now in danger of having to close Big Nick’s Burger & Pizza Joint, an institution on the Upper West Side.
abstract: Nick Imirziades, who has owned 15 restaurants in New York since 1963, is now in danger of having to close Upper West Side institution Big Nick’s Burger & Pizza Joint, due to 50-percent rent increase.
lead_paragraph: Nick Imirziades, who has owned 15 restaurants in New York since 1963, is now in danger of having to close Big Nick’s Burger & Pizza Joint, an institution on the Upper West Side.
